statements: SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE player_rank > 10 ORDER BY player_rank DESC;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_rank IS NULL;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_rank > 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_rank BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY player_rank ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE player_rank IS NOT NULL ORDER BY player_rank DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_rank > 20 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_rank < 5 OR player_rank > 25 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM players ORDER BY player_rank DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_rank > 10;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE session_capacity < 50;
SELECT session_id, session_name FROM game_sessions ORDER BY session_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_rank > 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE player_rank < 5 ORDER BY player_rank DESC;
SELECT session_name, session_capacity FROM game_sessions WHERE session_status = 'active' ORDER BY session_capacity DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_rank, session_name FROM players p JOIN game_sessions gs ON p.player_id = gs.session_id WHERE p.player_rank > 5 AND gs.session_capacity > 10;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND player_rank < 15 ORDER BY player_rank ASC, player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_duration FROM games WHERE game_duration > 30;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_name, player_rank, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level < 5 ORDER BY player_rank DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level, game_name FROM players JOIN player_matches ON players.player_id = player_matches.player1_id JOIN games ON player_matches.match_id = games.game_id;

SELECT player_name AS Player, match_result AS Result, game_name AS Game FROM player_matches JOIN players ON player_matches.player2_id = players.player_id JOIN games ON player_matches.match_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(match_id) AS Match_Count FROM players JOIN player_matches ON players.player_id = player_matches.player1_id GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY Match_Count DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, skill_level FROM players ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN matchups ON players.player_id = matchups.player_id JOIN games ON matchups.session_id = games.game_id;

SELECT player_name, session_date FROM players JOIN matchups ON players.player_id = matchups.player_id JOIN sessions ON matchups.session_id = sessions.session_id WHERE sessions.session_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT player_name, game_name, session_name FROM players JOIN matchups ON players.player_id = matchups.player_id JOIN games ON matchups.session_id = games.game_id JOIN sessions ON matchups.session_id = sessions.session_id ORDER BY player_name ASC, session_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, skill_level FROM players;
SELECT game_name, game_type FROM games WHERE game_type = 'Board';
SELECT player_name, skill_level FROM players ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_name, session_date FROM sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT matchup.match_id, players.player_name, games.game_name FROM matchups JOIN players ON matchups.player_id = players.player_id JOIN games ON matchups.session_id = games.game_id;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM Players WHERE player_rank > 5;
SELECT team_name, team_score FROM Teams ORDER BY team_score DESC;
SELECT match_id, match_date FROM Matches WHERE match_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, matches_played, matches_won FROM PlayerStats WHERE matches_played < 10;
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE player_rank > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_score FROM Teams WHERE team_score > 50 ORDER BY team_score DESC;
SELECT match_id, match_date FROM Matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY match_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, matches_played, matches_won FROM Players p JOIN PlayerStats ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id WHERE ps.matches_played > 10 ORDER BY matches_won DESC;

SELECT m.match_id, t1.team_name AS team1, t2.team_name AS team2, r.winning_team_id FROM Matches m JOIN Teams t1 ON m.team1_id = t1.team_id JOIN Teams t2 ON m.team2_id = t2.team_id JOIN MatchResults r ON m.match_id = r.match_id WHERE r.winning_team_id = t1.team_id;
